import React from 'react' export default function purchasedetails(props) { let tb=(props.purchase.purchased_items).map((item,index) => { return ( {item.id} {item.product.name + item.product.description} {item.quantity} {item.price} {item.discount_type} {item.discount} {item.tax.id} % {item.sub_total} ) }) return (

Purchase

Purchase No
{props.purchase.invoice.no}
Date Of Purchase
{(props.purchase.invoice_date).split('-').reverse().join('-')}
Delivered To
Address
City
Pincode
{props.purchase.supplier.display_name}
{props.purchase.supplier.payment_details.shipping_address.address}
{props.purchase.supplier.payment_details.shipping_address.city}
{props.purchase.supplier.payment_details.shipping_address.zip_code}
{tb}
No Product Quanity Price/Quantity Discount Type Discount Tax Amount
Subtotal
Tax
Discount
Total
Rs 1,64,000
18%
10%
{props.purchase.amount}
) }
